mic_test_button_tooltip_disabled: Mic test unavailable while in voice channel
parties_comm_button_error_not_in_party: Join a party to use League Voice
parties_comm_button_error_in_custom_game: League Voice is not available in custom games unless spectating is disabled
parties_comm_panel_error: Sorry, League Voice is currently unavailable.
parties_comm_panel_msg_solo: It looks like you're solo. Join a party with your friends to use League Voice!
parties_comm_panel_msg_premade_no_channe: Party members show up here when they connect to League Voice.
parties_comm_panel_msg_disconnected: Connect to use League Voice with your party
parties_comm_panel_tooltip_mute_disabled: Disabled while using push to talk
parties_comm_panel_tooltip_settings_disa: Voice settings unavailable while in game
voice_microphone_permissions_modal_body: To enable your microphone in voice chat, you must grant microphone permissions. In System Preferences, enable the checkbox for RiotClient.app under Privacy & Security > Privacy > Microphone . You will need to restart Riot Client before any changes can take place.
